text:
Hey everyone, Bitcoin here. I heard on
Twitter that Bitcoin was banned in India.

I wouldn't know because it hasn't really
interrupted my travel plans.
I beamed myself in through a block Stream satellite and I'm having a blast.

If you're ever here visiting the butter
chicken is particularly tasty.
However, I have noticed a few concerning things since I've been here.
There's rampant homelessness. I got lost multiple times due to the visibility being so, so low, thanks to the air pollution.
Uh, what else? A bum urinated on me and there's a lot of people defecating in the streets.
Anyhow, I'm a little confused about the Bitcoin

ban because it seems like they have much
bigger fish to fry here in India.
But, what do I know? I'm just a little coin.
